Title: Added cancelling matches
Description: Now users can cancell their own accepted matches

Title: Added Git Logger
Description: For easier management

Title: Updated Team Management UI
Description: Added missing data fields in edit form. Migrated to floating modal. Refactored layout. Missing pagination

Title: Improved Match History For User
Description: Ordered correctly now, improved visual cue for winners, refactored space usage

Title: Add lastResult and loosingStreak to team data
Description: Introduces lastResult and loosingStreak fields to team objects and propagates them throughout actions and UI components. Updates logic to set lastResult on match completion and expired match processing, and displays lastResult in TeamCard. Also fixes match ordering and date display in history, and improves ChallengeModal and PyramidRow refresh handling.

Title: Improves expired match processing and UI display
Description: Refactors expired match processing for better readability and maintainability.

Title: Changed to test db in server
Description: lots of pending stuff, gotta remove not null policy in position history

Title: Improves match completion logic and UI
Description: Refactors match completion process to include cellar team swapping for teams with long losing streaks, improving pyramid stability and team progression.

Title: Refactors match completion logic
Description: Simplifies and improves match completion process by extracting helper functions.

Title: Add cellar row to pyramid display and editing
Description: Introduces a dedicated 'cellar' (s√≥tano) row at the base of the pyramid in both player and admin views, with new CellarRow components for display and editing. Updates data handling to support the cellar row, adjusts styling for a wood-textured effect, and refines team selection and deletion logic. Also includes minor bug fixes, code cleanup, and improved error handling in modals.

Title: Temporal fix for miscelaneous problems
Description: Shield still doesn't show on admin panel, still not implemented auto punish, untested new risky checking

Title: Adds match history and disputed team stats
Description: Implements functionality to retrieve match history and identify the most disputed team within a pyramid.

Title: Fix param type check and conversion in PyramidView
Description: Changed the type check for param.id from number to string and added conversion to number before fetching pyramid data. This ensures correct handling of route parameters.

Title: Add defendable flag to teams and update match logic
Description: Introduces a 'defendable' boolean column to the team schema and database, with migration. Updates match acceptance and completion logic to set and reset this flag appropriately. Adjusts pyramid and team card UI to reflect defendable status, and ensures teams cannot be challenged while defendable. Also fixes some import paths and enables expired match checks in the user dropdown menu.

Title: Update match rejection logic and add pyramid view route
Description: Refactors match rejection and risky team logic to consider matches played since previous Monday, enforcing a minimum of 2 matches before demotion or rejection limits apply. Adds defended state to pyramid row/team card UI, updates not-found/global-not-found to use div instead of html/body, and introduces a new dynamic pyramid view route. Middleware now allows numeric public routes and improves route checks.

Title: Add bulk team retrieval for match cancellation
Description: Introduces getBulkTeamsWithPlayers to efficiently fetch multiple teams and their players. Updates AcceptMatch to use this function for sending cancellation emails to affected teams when a match is accepted.

Title: Improves match handling and notifications
Description: Refactors team data fetching to include player details, improving performance and data consistency.

Title: Changed handicap message
Description: Now it's on every service

Title: Enhances reject mail with player details.
Description: Improves the reject email notification by including the

Title: Extends session duration
Description: Increases the session `maxAge` from 16 hours to 30 days.

Title: Refactor team and user schema, update relations
Description: Major refactor of database schema and relations: team now references player1Id and player2Id, and positionHistory now uses teamId and affectedTeamId instead of challenger/defender. Updated related code and relations to match new schema. Also fixed display name logic to use maternalSurname, improved category color logic in TeamCard, and adjusted dev/start scripts to use port 3000. Removed unused code and improved error handling in actions.

Title: One step closer to the end
Almost ready, half of the risky done
Implements challenge functionality with email notifications
Description: Adds functionality to challenge other teams within the pyramid, including sending email notifications to the challenged team.

Title: Improves team management and user profile setup
Description: Enhances the team management page with create, edit, and delete functionality.

Description: Gotta change the schema to use lastnames only, team.name is being dropped

Description: Refactors match handling logic to enhance user experience, fix bugs, and improve admin match management.

Title: Implements pyramid display and selection
Description: Adds functionality for displaying and selecting pyramids, with different views for admins and regular users.

Title: Implements email-based login and profile setup
Description: Refactors the login flow to use a two-step email validation and password entry process.

Title: Updates database schema and logo size
Description: Updates table names in the database schema to plural form for consistency.

Title: Implements user authentication and profile setup
Description: Adds user registration and authentication using NextAuth.

Title: Add initial database schema and category display
Description: Introduces a comprehensive database schema for pyramid, category, team, profile, match, and related tables using drizzle-orm. Updates PlayerCard and Home page components to fetch and display category data from the database. Adjusts drizzle config for new schema location and options. Adds initial migration files for schema setup.
